scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn workspace safarnak-worker dev" "yarn workspace safarnak start"
scripts.dev:clean: concurrently "yarn workspace safarnak-worker dev" "yarn workspace safarnak start --clear"
scripts.build: yarn workspace safarnak-worker build && yarn workspace safarnak build
scripts.db:migrate:client: echo 'Client migrations are handled automatically by Expo SQLite'
scripts.db:purge: yarn db:purge:migrations && yarn db:purge:worker && yarn db:purge:client && yarn db:purge:cache
scripts.db:purge:migrations: rm -rf drizzle/migrations/client/* drizzle/migrations/worker/* && echo 'All migration files cleared'
scripts.db:purge:worker: rm -rf worker/.wrangler && echo 'Worker database and cache cleared'
scripts.db:purge:client: rm -rf client/db.db* && echo 'Client database files cleared'
scripts.db:purge:cache: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && echo 'Node modules cache cleared'
scripts.db:purge:all: yarn db:purge && rm -rf client/node_modules/.cache worker/node_modules/.cache && echo 'Complete purge completed - all databases, migrations, and caches cleared'
